actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An Act to incorporate the Roosevelt Memorial Association", approved May 31, 1920, to include in the governing instrument of such association provisions which meet the requirements of section 508(e) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Sets forth provisions specifying the status and operation of the Roosevelt Memorial Association as a private foundation exempt from taxation. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 508(e))

titles.title: A bill to amend the act entitled "An Act to incorporate the Roosevelt Memorial Association", approved May 31, 1920, to include in the governing instrument of such association provisions which meet the requirements of section 508(e) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
